source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Social Media Monitoring and Privacy Law
items.headline: Learn to monitor social networks without violating privacy rights in this course on lawful social media surveillance.
objectives_summary: Use social media to screen job applicants without making discriminatory hiring decisions
Monitor what employees and coworkers say on social media without violating privacy law
Lawfully access social media and personal email accounts with violating privacy rights

items.title: Social Media Crisis Prevention
items.headline: Get practical skills to protect your reputation and your organization against a social media meltdown.
objectives_summary: What is considered reckless misconduct on social media
Use social media without violating federal, state and local laws
Use social media without infringing on intellectual property rights

Develop more inclusive and productive spaces

Understand what FLOW is & how important it is for results in business.
The link between Trust & Flow in business.

items.title: Social Media FTC Disclosure Training
items.headline: Use social media for sales, marketing and service without violating US Federal Trade Commission Disclosure Guidelines
objectives_summary: Which types of social networking profiles require disclosures, and which ones don’t
What types of post, shares and tweets require disclosures, and which ones don’t
Where you need to make social media disclosures and when they’re required

items.title: Drafting Social Media Policies
items.headline: Learn Social Media Policy for Business, Corporate Social Media Policy Examples. Includes a Social Media Policy Template.
objectives_summary: Includes a social media policy template and resources

Covers social media policy format

objectives_summary: How to implement effective interventional strategies for improving gender equality

Outline the role performed by Payroll department in the organization

items.title: Think like a migrant, act like a local
items.headline: Migrants and locals are two sides of a coin—a journey of collaborative adaptation
objectives_summary: We all migrants and hosts need to be aware of cultural differences and sensitives. More understanding you have more integration is possible and more benefit can be reaped for both parties.
Critical things to remember in adaptation process, understanding of behaviour and perspective from both ends are very essential to embrace and work collaboratively.

So migrants who want to succeed in new land or organisations who are working or sending migrants around the world, all need to understand different culture and communication to get the optimum result. Because Human resource are the heart and soul of any business.

items.title: Are You Ready for the Aging Workforce?
items.headline: More people are working later in life.  Are you aware of the small changes that take place with the mature worker?
objectives_summary: You will know what to be looking for within this age group and can make minor adjustments, so that the mature worker will have fewer accidents.  These changes will even benefit the younger worker.

items.title: Fundamental Human Resources Management Lectures Series
items.headline: Management, Human Resources, Manpower Planning, Performance Management, Change Management
objectives_summary: Student will learn about  the role of HR in the organization based on the current knowledge
Student will learn about  three HR main functions which are employee acquisition, employee management, and employee optimization
